name: Hard Platformer
description: This is  your basic platformer game. The aim of the game is to collect all the coins in each level, and avoid the spikes. and there are some hidden sections in the game (which aren't really hidden), that are complicated to get to, but it is possible. this is made by one person, so if you find any bugs please write a comment telling me what happened. hope you enjoy this platformer, and please feel free to rate it.
